title: How do I access the safe using my fingerprint?
answer:
You can access the safe using your fingerprint and the password after Access safe is enabled.

Go to Settings > All > Privacy & passwords > Fingerprint ID > Fingerprint management and enter the unlock password. You need to enter the password for the safe before enabling Access safe. If you haven't created a safe, the screen to enable the safe will be displayed. You can create a safe and set a password. After that you can enable Access safe.

Go to Files > Safe to access your safe.
